meanings.definition: Eager to eat small amounts of food between meals.
meanings.sent1: I feel so snacky right now; I could eat a whole bag of chips!
meanings.sent2: She always keeps some snacky treats in her purse for when she gets hungry.
meanings.sent3: My cat gets snacky too and meows for treats all the time.
meanings.sent4: The snacky squirrel quickly grabbed the nuts and scurried away.
meanings.sent5: The snacky kids eagerly awaited the pizza delivery.

meanings.definition: A small amount of food eaten between meals.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed a quick snacky of apple slices before heading out.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine had a variety of snacky options like chips and candy bars.
meanings.sent3: The movie night was complete with popcorn and other snacky delights.
meanings.sent4: The picnic basket was filled with snacky goodies for the day at the park.
meanings.sent5: The office always had a bowl of snacky treats for everyone to enjoy.
